attributes.review: When I open the app I just get a white screen. I’ve tried everything including restarting my phone but it doesn’t work. If I wait long enough the app crashes. Please fix.
attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.review: This app was full of trash!! It took way to long to download and I saw an orange man who acted like a child! I had my pet rat out and I once I opened the app my rat DIED. It then proceeded to lag and started to play speeches. These speeches ATTACKED my family and their ear drums were BLEEDING. I am very disappointed!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: I used to think iPhones could not get viruses on them but this app made my phone glitch out and get all my contacts deleted!! I tried to delete the app but it wiped my phone clean and the only thing that remained was the app!! DO NOT RECOMMEND.
attributes.title: Horrible App!!!

attributes.review: When I opened the app it made my phone glitch so badly I had to get a new one it is horrible do not download it it may cost you a new phone lost everything on my old phone now I have to restart
attributes.title: Bugs

attributes.review: I tried to download it and it took a long time and when I downloaded it was just terrible and theses people came to my house and said sorry no monkeys allowed on this app and we’re chanting and I ran out this is the worst app ever😐
attributes.title: The worst app ever

attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus and made it glitch so badly! I wanted to support the president but this app is just very badly made and it bothered me very much that a man like him couldn’t make this app better. There are too many things wrong with this app and I hate it
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: If I could rate this below a 1, I honestly would. Here’s why. First of all, I don’t support Trump, and only got this to see what all of his irrelevant supporters said about him. There were a lot of racist and masochistic comments regarding women and children of all races/ages. I am so disappointed. KANYE 2020.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn how to best support the US but every time I go to open the app it crashes. And when I did manage to successfully open the app, it would only ever show me a zoomed in picture of orange skin.
attributes.title: Not Worth the Download

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be more informed about trump and to see if maybe there’s a reason why people like trump so much. I wanted this app to change my views, but it didn’t. it just proved to me how incompetent trump is. For a news app, it is highly biased.
attributes.title: I tried

attributes.review:
Trump is a racist, bigoted, misogynist, sexist, offensive, and overall a horrible person. Some of you may be asking well thats not bad and To which i say there is too long of a list to completely expose all his misdeeds.
He deserves the electric chair and or firing squad.
attributes.title: Horrible person
